item.title: port forwarding in xfinity
item.description: This article is part of my Today I Learnt. I have been trying to share whatever I learnt newly on the day. Some of them are basic, but still I want to write it down for two reasons. To help me understand the concepts better Potential help other people who running in to same issue. Alright, It’s all started when I bought a new domain (synergy.net) for my Dad.
